email_content:
Dear University of Excellence Alumni,

I hope you are doing well. I’m pleased to share a brief snapshot of this year’s applicant pool:

• Total applications received: approximately 5,000
• Average SAT score: around 1420
• Average ACT score: about 32
• Applicants represent more than 100 countries, underscoring the truly global interest in our programs.

These numbers reflect the growing reputation of our university and the strength of the community you helped build. Thank you for your continued support and for proudly representing Excellence around the world.

Warm regards,
[Your Name]
Admissions Office
University of Excellence
